SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 52
Translation from PROLOG(ASP) to PROLEG
Consider the following PROLOG program tre(P1):
P: −not Q.
Q: −not R.
R.
Then, tro(tre(P1)) = ⟨Hoe, Eoe⟩becomes (by introducing some new
predicates) where Hoe is as follows:
P <= c1.
c1 <=.
Q <= c2.
c2 <=.
R <=.
and Eoe becomes the following set of exceptions:
exception(c1,Q).
exception(c2,R).
The model of this PROLEG program is {P, c2, R}.
52
speaker: SYSTEM
